Flame Atronach Armour CBBE
Dark Atronach Armour CBBE
Silver Atronach Armour CBBE
With Helm
Flame Fx Armour

========
-- Manual install info
Place the folders: Meshes, Textures and the ESP into the Skyrim Data folder.

========
-- Manual uninstall info
Delete the ESP and the files named atronacharmour + darkatronach inside the textures+meshes armor folder.

========
--Required Mods
Caliente's CBBE Body

========
--Known Issues

The helm disappears if dropped from the players inventory.

========
--Change Log
Some users had issues with CTD with the 1.0 version so i added a fix which should sort this problem.

1.1 Contains the updated esp. and should not have any CTD issues.

Optional file added for different armour variations. (Now includes: Cloth and Light as well as the original Heavy!)

2.0 Have added the armour variants to the main files.
Correct some wrong armour values
!!NEW!!
Brand new content of flame FX on armours and helm
Also by request a hornless version of the curiass
Brand new gauntlets and feet objects (Now everything matches!)

2.1 Removed weight slider capabilities as they were causing bugs, hopefully this is only a temporary measure. Sorry!

2.2 Now using a file which only works with CBBE Curvy at 100% Weight / Max Weight

========
--Side notes

Still waiting on permissions from the person who made the HD textures which i used as a base. If they have any issues with me using their textures on my mod i will of course remove this mod from the public.

========
